|l| Jim Jim Sr
|c|☆HopOnMyArk|I can report scores for us
|c|☆HopOnMyArk|was the goodra a rest set?
|c|☆capfox1987|indeed, was not ready for weakness policy lol
|c|☆HopOnMyArk|yeah I saw it done in a youtube vid this week and decided to give it a go
|c|☆HopOnMyArk|my goodra was a shelter toxic set too lol
|c|☆capfox1987|I wish it was a rain clense / phat boy with some coverage moves
|c|☆HopOnMyArk|I was gonna say
|c|☆HopOnMyArk|If you had hydration with rain it wouldve been hard to chip through
|c|☆capfox1987|yeah losing pelipper hurt
|c|☆HopOnMyArk|yeah for sure
|c|☆capfox1987|Hoopa is crazy go brrr
|c|☆HopOnMyArk|nothing likes shadow ball hoopa
|c|☆HopOnMyArk|lol
|c|☆HopOnMyArk|but hey ggs again and good luck next week :) also excited to partner up next season. Maybe we'll meet again in playoffs
